/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image presents a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their facades bathed in the warm glow of the sun. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.

Vehicles, including cars and buses, are scattered along the street, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static urban landscape. The street itself is lined with trees, their green foliage contrasting with the concrete structures and adding a touch of nature to the cityscape.

The image is captured from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of scale to the scene. Despite the absence of people in the frame, the image conveys a sense of vibrancy and activity, characteristic of a busy city street.
